visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: '3D Column Chart Example', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the title and axis labels, with a font size of 14px. Data series: Two series with data [1, 2, 4] and [5, 6, 3], respectively. Custom colors: Use a gradient from #7cb5ec to #434348 for the columns. Additional configurations: Enable 3D options with alpha: 15, beta: 15, and depth: 40. Enable stacking for the columns and set the chart margins to 75.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D column chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and 3D options are enabled with alpha and beta angles of 15 degrees and a depth of 40. The chart title is styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are also styled with the same dark blue color and font size. The columns are stacked and colored with a gradient from light blue to dark gray. The data series include two sets of data, each with a name and corresponding data points.
